#text=So I went to the nearby public library to see if they had a book that would be useful to me .
#text=I walked into the building and found the nonfiction section .
#text=I then sat at a computer and did a search for gardening books .
#text=Lots of books showed up on my search .
#text=I took a small pencil and piece of paper that were sitting next to the computer and wrote down several book titles with their call numbers next to them .
#text=I then looked at the shelves for the corresponding call numbers .
#text=When I found my section , I then looked for the exact numbers to find the books I had found on the computer search .
#text=I found the books and took them out of the shelf to get a better look .
#text=After browsing through them for a few minutes , I decided that I did want these books .
#text=I picked them up and walked over to the circulation desk .
#text=I handed the librarian my library card and the books I wanted to get .
#text=She checked them out for me , and told me when they were due .
#text=I then walked out of the library with my books .
